verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> or <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> O <S%H430>god,<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>fixed;<s%> I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> and give <S%H2167>praise,<s%> <S%H637>even<s%> with my <S%H3519>glory.<s%>
I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> you, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> among the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> praises to you among the <S%H3816>nations.<s%>
For your <S%H2617>mercy<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens:<s%> and your <S%H571>truth<s%> reaches to the <S%H7834>clouds.<s%>
Be you <S%H7311>exalted,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens:<s%> and your <S%H3519>glory<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> all the <S%H776>earth;<s%>
That your <S%H3039>beloved<s%> may be <S%H2502>delivered:<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> with your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and <S%H6030>answer<s%> me.

<S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in his <S%H6944>holiness;<s%> I will <S%H5937>rejoice,<s%> I will <S%H2505>divide<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> and <S%H4058>mete<s%> out the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth.<s%>
<S%H1568>Gilead<s%> is mine; <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> is mine; <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> also is the <S%H4581>strength<s%> of my <S%H7218>head;<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is my <S%H2710>lawgiver;<s%>

<S%H4124>Moab<s%> is my wash <S%H5518>pot;<s%> <S%H7366><s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H123>Edom<s%> will I <S%H7993>cast<s%> out my <S%H5275>shoe;<s%> over <S%H6429>Philistia<s%> will I <S%H7321>triumph.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> will <S%H2986>bring<s%> me into the <S%H4013>strong<s%> <S%H5892>city?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> will <S%H5148>lead<s%> me <S%H5704>into<s%> <S%H123>Edom?<s%>
Will not you, O <S%H430>God,<s%> who have <S%H2186>cast<s%> us off? and will not you, O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> with our <S%H6635>hosts?<s%>
<S%H3051>Give<s%> us <S%H5833>help<s%> from <S%H6862>trouble:<s%> for <S%H7723>vain<s%> is the <S%H8668>help<s%> of <S%H120>man.<s%>
Through <S%H430>God<s%> we shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly:<s%> for he it is that shall <S%H947>tread<s%> down our <S%H6862>enemies.<s%>
